src:
Ada Dua Pemain yang Buat Chelsea Jadi Kuat Musim Ini, Siapakah Dia?
05 Nov 2019, 04:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Mayoritas publik dulunya meyakini bahwa Chelsea akan menuai banyak masalah pada musim 2019/20 ini. Pasalnya, klub asuhan Frank Lampard tersebut tak bisa menambal kelemahannya karena tak bisa terlibat dalam bursa transfer musim panas kemarin.
Eden Hazard memutuskan untuk memenuhi pinangan Real Madrid, sementara Maurizio Sarri memilih bergabung dengan Juventus. Lalu, Chelsea mengangkat Lampard yang masih hijau di dunia kepelatihan sebagai nahkodanya.
Wajar bila publik meyakini bahwa perjalanan Chelsea di musim ini takkan berjalan dengan mulus. Namun kenyataannya justru terlihat berbeda. Mereka mampu duduk di empat besar klasemen Premier League dan baru saja menorehkan lima kemenangan berturut-turut.
Tidak hanya di Premier League, Chelsea juga apik saat bermain dalam ajang Liga Champions. Sejauh ini, mereka sudah mencatatkan dua kemenangan dan sedang duduk di puncak klasemen Grup H dengan raihan enam angka.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
There Are Two Players That Make Chelsea So Strong This Season, Who Is He?
05 Nov 2019, 04:52 by Bola.net
Bola.net - The majority of the public used to believe that Chelsea would have many problems this 2019/20 season. The reason is Frank Lampard's club cannot patch up his weaknesses because he couldn't get involved in the transfer market last summer.
Eden Hazard decided to fulfill the proposal of Real Madrid, while Maurizio Sarri chose to join Juventus. Then, Chelsea raised Lampard who is still green in the world of coaching as his captain.
Naturally, if the public believes that Chelsea's trip this season will not run smoothly. But in reality it looks different. They are able to sit in the top four of the Premier League standings and have just incised five wins in a row.
Not only in the Premier League, Chelsea are also slick when playing in the Champions League. So far, they have recorded two wins and are sitting at the top of Group H with six points.

Scroll down to read full information.
